name: Book of Moon (demo)
description:
Our story begins with Tullo, an orphan recently adopted by  a reclusive and eccentric millionaire, Sigmund Baines.  Tullo soon discovers dreadful secrets and past tragedy hidden beneath the luxury of the mansion and the icy demeanour of Mr Baines' faithful servant girl, Miyako.

Note: This is not a finished product and was made with limited resources. While I'm not adverse donations, it is entirely optional and  probably will not affect the likelihood of a full release. While money is an obstacle, a full release is not currently realistic because I lack the connections to find artists, composers, voice actors etc. etc. in order to fully realize my vision and I lack the various skillsets I would require  to create it alone.

Logo designed using designevo.com
